column2: RPT-AB InBev faces delicate balance in structuring SABMiller bid BRUSSELS/LONDON
column3: Sept 30 A $70 billion debt package being arranged to fund Anheuser-Busch InBev's  takeover of SABMiller still leaves the world's largest brewer with a tricky balancing act in satisfying a range of shareholder camps with different needs.

column2: Hewlett-Packard board approves splitUPDATE 2-Hewlett-Packard board approves split into 2 companiesHewlett-Packard board approves split into two companiesAutonomy's Mike Lynch counter sues HP over $11 bln dealUPDATE 2-Autonomy's Mike Lynch counter sues HP over $11 bln dealAutonomy's Mike Lynch counter sues HP over $11 bln deal British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch on Thursday said he would file a claim against Hewlett-Packard for $150 million in damages over allegations the U.S company made about his role in the acquisition of his software company Autonomy in 2011.  Autonomy's Mike Lynch counter sues HP over $11 bln deal British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch on Thursday said he would file a claim against Hewlett-Packard for $150 million in damages over allegations the U.S company made about his role in the acquisition of his software company Autonomy in 2011. LONDON

column2: Pentagon says working to fix F-35 ejection seat issues WASHINGTON
column3: Oct 1 The Pentagon on Wednesday said it has restricted some lighter pilots from flying the Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jet while it works to address issues with ejection seats that could injure them during a low-speed ejection from the jets.

column2: California could be PBF's biggest refinery challenge yet HOUSTON PBF Energy Inc's purchase of Exxon Mobil Corp's California refinery marks Chairman Tom O'Malley's biggest bet yet on U.S. refining in the country's toughest market.

column2: Mosaic settles claims with environmental agenciesUPDATE 2-Mosaic Co settles U.S. environment claims for over $800 mln Oct 1 Fertilizer maker Mosaic Co has reached a settlement worth more than $800 million with U.S. regulators over its waste management practices at plants in Florida and Louisiana.  UPDATE 2-Mosaic Co settles U.S. environment claims for over $800 mln Oct 1 Fertilizer maker Mosaic Co has reached a settlement worth more than $800 million with U.S. regulators over its waste management practices at plants in Florida and Louisiana. Oct 1 Fertilizer maker Mosaic Co's unit said it reached settlements with federal and state environmental authorities to resolve claims regarding its waste management practices at its manufacturing plants in Florida and Louisiana.UPDATE 2-Mosaic Co settles U.S. environment claims for over $800 mln Oct 1 Fertilizer maker Mosaic Co has reached a settlement worth more than $800 million with U.S. regulators over its waste management practices at plants in Florida and Louisiana.
